HeterogenousMutationInterface - Interface in optimization.stochastic.operators
This interface extends the basic mutation interface in that it supports heterogenous mutations rates where each feature can mutate at a different rate.
HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator - Class in optimization.stochastic.operators.onFloats

HillClimbingLeap - Class in optimization.stochastic.algorithms
A class that implements a simple twist to the basic hill-climbing approach, by introducing a small probability of making larger changes, 'leaps' towards unexplored parts of the optimization landscape.
